sentences.en: All colour fades— especially under the impact of direct sunlight.
sentences.cn: 所有颜色都会褪色——尤其是在阳光直射下。

sentences.en: Art books are expensive to produce, especially if they contain colour illustrations.
sentences.cn: 美术类书籍制作成本很高，尤其是那些带彩色插图的。

sentences.en: Full-size tripods can be awkward, especially if you'reshooting a low-level subject.
sentences.cn: 标准尺寸的三脚架可能会不便于使用，用于拍摄低角度的物体时尤其如此。

sentences.en: HDTV is especially useful if there are a lot of special effects.
sentences.cn: 有很多特效的时候，高清电视就格外有用了。

sentences.en: He is especially emphatic about the value of a precise routine.
sentences.cn: 他特别强调严格按程序走的意义。

sentences.en: He was disinclined to talk about himself, especially to his students.
sentences.cn: 他不喜欢谈论他自己，尤其是当着他学生的面。

sentences.en: I never liked long walks, especially in winter.
sentences.cn: 我向来不喜欢长距离散步，尤其在冬天。

sentences.en: I was especially fond of chocolate biscuits.
sentences.cn: 我特别爱吃巧克力饼干。

sentences.en: It was especially galling to be criticised by this scoundrel.
sentences.cn: 被这个无赖指责让人尤其气愤。

sentences.en: Millions of wild flowers colour the valleys, especially in April and May.
sentences.cn: 尤其是在四五月份，不计其数的野花盛开，山谷里一片绚烂色彩。

sentences.en: She bought a new pair of trainers especially for the trip.
sentences.cn: 她特地为那次旅行买了一双新的运动鞋。

sentences.en: So many days are routine and uninteresting, especially in winter.
sentences.cn: 许多日子都过得平淡乏味，尤其是在冬天。

sentences.en: Sue and John were especially thrilled with this award.
sentences.cn: 休和约翰对于获得这个奖项感到兴奋不已。

sentences.en: The committee is concerned about players' behaviour, especially arguing with referees.
sentences.cn: 委员会很关注运动员的行为，特别是与裁判争吵的行为。

sentences.en: The ersatz spontaneity of "Sunday Love" sounds especially hollow.
sentences.cn: 对《星期天的爱情》这首歌的即兴模仿听起来尤其空洞。

sentences.en: The soil must not be overwatered, especially during the first few weeks.
sentences.cn: 切忌土壤过涝，尤其在最初几周。

sentences.en: Try to view situations more objectively, especially with regard to work.
sentences.cn: 要尽量客观地分析情况，尤其是在工作上。

sentences.en: Under all the innocent fun, there are hidden dangers, especially for children.
sentences.cn: 在所有简单无害的娱乐项目背后都隐藏着危险，特别是对儿童而言。

sentences.en: We loved the food so much, especially the fish dishes.
sentences.cn: 我们很喜欢这些食物，尤其是鱼。

trans.tran_en: used to emphasize that something is more important or happens more with one particular thing than with others
